'''1.21.1''' is a minor hotfix update to ''[[Java Edition]]'' released on August 8, 2024,<ref name="mcnet">{{cite|url=https://www.minecraft.net/en-us/article/minecraft-java-edition-1-21-1|title=Minecraft Java Edition 1.21.1|date=August 8, 2024|website=Minecraft.net}}</ref> which fixes critical exploits including update suppression, and adds two new [[language]]s. Servers running this version are compatible with [[Java Edition 1.21|1.21]] clients.

== Additions ==
=== General ===
'''[[Language]]s'''
* Added support for [[w:Tzotzil language|Tzotzil]] and [[w:Belarusian Latin alphabet|Belarusian (Latin)]] languages.

== Fixes ==
{{Fixes|fixedin=1.21.1|otherissuescount=2
|;old
|MC-254899|Sitting/standing a tamed cat does not trigger <code>minecraft:player_interacted_with_entity</code>
|MC-260689|Arm spins when swimming with a loaded Crossbow in your offhand
}}
'''Private issues'''
* Fixed block entity swap based [[update suppression]] as shown in [https://youtu.be/77M8Adnxmsw this video].
* Fixed an exploit which allows modified clients to crash the server by requesting command completion for a malicious target selector input, causing a crash due to stack exhaustion.</onlyinclude>
